title: LFM For Rank 5s To Develope Friendships and Teamwork Gold++
body:
Hey Guys Posipi Here

I am wanting to create a rank 5s team what is active,motivated and wanting to learn well building teamwork and confidence with each other. i am a gold 4 Mid player who enjoys the game basically play everyday till late. i am wanting players who enjoy the game like i do who has fun and knowledge of the game and knows how to play there role and develop as a team. i dont really wanna say more youll understand what im thinking if your the right PLAyer! 

Requirements Im looking For In players:

Willing to play Most days or night whatever Suits the team the best.
Must have skype or teamspeak and a working mic.
Gold ++ In this season League
Be able to communicate with others 
Know how to fun
Want to develop into a rank 5s player.
People Who want to Do tournaments in Future!

Roles Currently:

Top:KHYZAH gold 5
Jungle:Qpidz  pLAT 5
Mid: Posipi Gold 4
ADC:xuzhenlin Gold 1
Support:TBC

If you are interested then please feel free to leave a msg on this post or add me in game  Posipi Remeber there is a space before my name in game. Look Forward To find the right Players and cant wait too play and develop as a team!

replies.body: LOOKING FOR GOOD DEDICATED SUPPORT ADD  POsipi IF INTERESTED OR LEAVE A POST
